cashier_password.description: if neither lock_password nor unlock_password is passed, we'll just return the status for cashier

unlock_password.description: old password to unlock cashier, required for unlock

lock_password.description: new password to lock cashier, required for lock

passthrough.description: Optional field, used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the echo_req output field.

req_id.description: Optional field to map request to response
